original_title: BTS Love Yourself : Speak Yourself [The Final]
overview: The finale of the LOVE YOURSELF Tour attended by 2.06 million people through 62 concerts in 24 cities around the world, spectacular performances and special effects that filled the Seoul Jamsil Olympic Stadium and the live atmosphere of the last day of the LOVE YOURSELF Tour.
title: BTS Love Yourself : Speak Yourself [The Final]
